properties.areaDesc: Lauderdale, TN; Crockett, TN; Dyer, TN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 9:10PM CST until January 12 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Obion River...S.F. of the Forked
Deer River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the S.F. of the Forked Deer River near Halls
* from Saturday January 11 until Sunday January 12.
* At 8 PM Friday the stage was 7.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 13.0 feet on Saturday January 11.
* Flood stage is 9.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Saturday January 11 and
continue to rise to near 13.0 feet by Saturday January 11.The river
will fall below flood stage by Sunday January 12.
* At 12.5 feet...Water is flowing over Highway 210 north of Halls.
Several low-lying roads near the South Fork of the Forked Deer
River are flooded.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued Saturday afternoon or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
